name: Kirara
storytext: On tails twain and padded feet, to all doors shall she deliver.
source: Reward for inviting Kirara to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Meow-teor Kick
skills.descriptionreplaced: Creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Urgent Neko Parcel</color> and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield of Safe Transport</color>.
skills.description: Creates 1 Urgent Neko Parcel and Shield of Safe Transport.

skills.name: Secret Art: Surprise Dispatch
skills.descriptionraw: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C117073]</color> on the opponent's side of the field.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deals 4 {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color>, creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Cat Grass Cardamom</color> on the opponent's side of the field.
skills.description: Deals 4 Dendro DMG, creates 1 Cat Grass Cardamom on the opponent's side of the field.
